Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! 

I recently started a new career with the GPP planet pack. I have got quite a few mods installed, here is the complete list: 

Spoiler

Mods :

GPP, USI life support, FMRS, Ven's stock revamp, Near future technologies (the whole pack), Better burn time, Navball docking alignment indicator, RealPlume, HotRockets, K-OS, PersistentRotation, Kerbal engineer, Transfer window planner, Kerbal alarm clock, Trajectories, Contract configurator, xScience, Dynamic battery storage, B9 part switch, Community tech tree, Science relay, Station parts expansion, DangIt 

 

Dependencies :

USI tools, Kopernicus, UmbraSpaceIndustires, Community resource pack, Community category kit, Modular flight integrator, Module manager

I am on the steam build of the game.

Here is the issue: I noticed my available Kerbals were disappearing of the astronaut complex, even if never assigned to any mission. The "lost" counter is still zero. Two Kerbals have already disappeared, and these two have never ever been assigned to any mission.

Could someone help me fix this issue once and for all (apart from cheating astronauts into the game)?

Edited August 20, 2017 by Kottalos

Delete the GPP_Renamer folder from inside the GPP folder (that's my fault). You won't get Gaeleans anymore it'll fix any problems.

Edited August 22, 2017 by TheRagingIrishman
